summary: Comprehensive testing of Gamelo Arabic Digital Marketplace - All 28 backend API tests passed (100%), Frontend UI tests passed with proper RTL layout and responsive design

issues: Price selector not found by generic CSS class - uses custom styling (not a bug, just different implementation)

critical_code_review_comments: Console warning: Missing `Description` or `aria-describedby` for DialogContent - minor accessibility improvement needed in admin dialogs

success_rate.frontend: 100% (all pages load correctly, RTL working, responsive design working)

seed_data_creation: Test users and products created during backend testing with TEST_ prefix
context_for_next_testing_agent: All APIs working correctly. Backend tests cover: Auth (login/register), Categories, Products (CRUD, codes), Orders (create, reveal), Admin (wallet credit, stats, users, roles). Frontend pages tested: Homepage, Products, Product Detail, Login, Register, Admin Dashboard, Admin Products Management. Mobile responsiveness verified.

purchase_flow: complete_purchase_flow (create product -> add codes -> credit wallet -> purchase -> reveal)

product_detail: Customer details form for account products
